nodes.text: Merl's was a cantina located in Muracie on Centares. It was owned by Merl. Food from Merl's was smuggled to Tyler Lucian. Merl and his bouncers, Glocken and Uri, were killed in a firefight with Beilert Valance, when the bounty hunter tried to get Merl to reveal the hiding place of Lucian.
